short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides additional web usage data for Layer1.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Companion to the Layer1 macOS application.

This extension allows the Layer1 desktop application to control the browser in depth (opening, activating, reordering and closing tabs).

Additionally allows the Layer1 desktop application to do deep introspection of browser usage that help capture better data for use in Layer1 Rewind.

All usage data is kept locally on the machine where the Layer1 desktop application is running.
